    Paul Chiusano: Advanced Stream Processing in Scala

    By Chris Myers August 25, 2013 Permalink

    Paul Chiusano (@pchiusano), co-author of Functional Programming in Scala dives deep into advanced stream processing in Scala showing how streams are compositional, efficient and safe. This is a great talk for those wanting to utilise the scalaz-stream library.

    You can find other talks Paul has done on functionaltalks.org here.

    You can find the talk here on YouTube.
